content:
Does anyone use Block Refresh? I saw a question from a new user in the forum and the module looked interesting so I tried to install to see if I could answer it, but I got the same results so I wasn't much help.
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/how-block-refresh-help-needed

I've tested this myself, and the module seems to be broken (or regressed at some point I guess). Created https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/block_refresh/issues/3

Block not refreshing as expected, and no button/link when configured to manually refresh 路 Issue #3 路 backdrop-contrib/block_refresh
This problem has previously been reported a few years ago in #1, but also now in the forum: https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/how-block-refresh-help-needed I set up a view showing newly posted co...
My site that's using it was using version 1.x-2.5.1
